title: Ast√©rix : Mission Potions !
summary: You're a young druid learning the potioncraft with the most prominent druid of all : Getafix ! But Asterix, Obelix and Dogmatix come with some bad news, they've spotted some romans in the forest. Getafix wants to craft the famous magic potion but an ingredient is missing ! You will have to go on a quest for four leaf clovers with Asterix and Obelix !
